    public class ChoseImageActivity
extends Activity
implements com.kbeanie.imagechooser.api.ImageChooserListener
    In this ChoseImageActivity there are two main things to do 1.take Image want you want add image into the app you can choose take the image then it will give the camron then you can take by yourself. 2.choose Image you also can choose the image which saved locally. when you using that it will list all the image that what we have.

    zuo2
